name: Easy Bunny Cake
author: Joni Ehman
summary: A simple version of a coconut white cake shaped like a bunny head!
directions: Heat oven and prepare two 9 inch round baking pans as directed on cake box
Prepare cake batter with as directed on package adding in 1/2 cup of coconut
Divide batter evenly between the prepared pans
Bake and cool cake as directed on package
When cooled, place one whole 9 inch cake layer on serving tray, forming the bunny's head
Cut 2 convex shaped ears from each side of the second layer, place on each side of head to form ears
Use concave shaped piece for the bowtie, place about 1/2 inch below head
Frost entire bunny covering top and sides of bunny
Pat remaining 3 1/4 cup coconut evenly over top and sides
Decorate the bunny face and bowtie with jellybeans and use the licorice to make whiskers
